diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CD$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $AC$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $16$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $z$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $y$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
The line $AD$ is perpendicular to the line $BD$.
The line $BD$ is perpendicular to the line $AB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, forming a triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $CD$, forming a triangle $BCD$.
